Dalam kes baru, Ryan bodyguard kepada seorang Dato’ menghadapi masalah dengan seorang perempuan simpanan.

programme.title: Azem 4
programme.desc: Ilmu hitam yang canggih telah dihasilkan oleh seorang syeikh yang jahat dan seorang ibu yang balik dari menziarahi anak dan isterinya. Tujuan ilmu hitam itu tidak ketara tetapi ia berakhir dengan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh isteri terhadap suaminya.

programme.title: 4 Tahun Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mariam berjumpa Tok Moh yang mengatakan dia telah diganggu penjelmaan seorang wanita dan tidak lagi mahu berterusan dengan tugasan memisahkan Rafiq dan Sarakit. Mengimbas balik, Mariam enggan memberikan kebenaran untuk Rafiq berkahwin dengan Sarakit. Mariam telah berjumpa Tok Moh untuk memisahkan Rafiq dari Sarakit yang menyebabkan Sarakit diganggu mimpi ngeri. Kini, Mariam pula diganggu penjelmaan Sarakit dan perkara ini diceritakan kepada Rafiq. Rafiq mengambil keputusan untuk pulang kerana memikirkan Sarakit yang masih belum dapat dihubungi. Ramdi pula diganggu hantu tenggek yang dibawa merayau-rayau setiap malam. Pada satu malam, Pak Bado pula mendengar suara bayi menangis dan mendapati bungkusan mengandungi janin di hadapan rumahnya yang diletak oleh lembaga putih berambut panjang.

programme.title: Azam
programme.desc: Azam seorang pemuda yang perlu menghadapi masyarakat selepas 17 tahun menjalani hukuman akibat melakukan rompakan di sebuah bank. Tetapi masyarakat kampung nyata tidak mudah menerima seorang bekas banduan. Bukan itu sahaja, bekas isterinya Tipah yang kini telah berkahwin dengan Musa seorang guru silat tidak dapat menerimanya. Kecuali Pak Itam dan isterinya sahaja yang bersimpati, Azam harus menghadapi pelbagai tohmahan dan penghinaan daripada orang kampung.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep2
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah bagaimana Imran berjaya membuktikan kebolehan magiknya kepada Maira iaitu seorang remaja perempuan yang terlebih dahulu dibawah jagaan nenek Imran kerana ibunya bekerja di Kuala Lumpur. Maira menceritakan kebolehan Imran kepada rakan-rakannya Haikal dan Zara yang tidak sangka kebolehan Imran itu kemudiannya mendapat tarikan khalayak kampung yang sanggup membayar untuk menyaksi pertunjukannya ketika dia berada di kedai Pak Salim. Dalam perjalanan pulang mereka berempat telah melihat lintasan cahaya diruang angkasa yang kemudiannya menyebabkan mereka demam.

programme.title: Seekers Underground Ep034
programme.desc: Seekers kembali dengan nama baru Seekers Underground. Dengan teknologi baru serta tinjaun ke lokasi yang belum pernah diterokai

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong
programme.desc: Tom yum goong (2005) ialah filem Thai,Inggeris,Mandarin,Vietnam. Prachya Pinkaew telah mengarahkan filem ini. Tony Jaa,Nathan Jones,Xing Jin,Petchtai Wongkamlao adalah pelakon filem ini. Ia telah dikeluarkan pada tahun 2005. Tom yum goong (2005) dianggap sebagai salah satu filem Aksi, Jenayah, Drama, Thriller terbaik di India dan di seluruh dunia.

programme.title: Sembilu 2
programme.desc: Hubungan Awie dan Wati semakin baik dan mereka merancang untuk mengikat tali pertunangan. Sekali lagi menghadapi kesukaran apabila Ziana muncul untuk memecahbelahkan hubungan mereka berdua demi mendapatkan Awie. Menaruh hati kepada Wati, Syamsul ingin menjadikannya sebagai isteri. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella 2
programme.desc: Hakimi kini menjadi CEO di syarikat Megapuri Bhd yang dimiliki oleh Puteri Megawati. Oleh sebab tidak dapat membiasakan diri dengan kehidupan barunya, Hakimi bertindak dengan meletakkan jawatan dan perkara ini merisaukan Puteri Megawati. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang wanita bernama Anisah jatuh hati kepada Hakimi. Dia menawarkan pekerjaan kepada Hakimi di syarikatnya dan pelbagai konflik berlaku di antara Hakimi, Puteri Megawati dan Anisah.

programme.title: Bayangan Maut
programme.desc: Anggota Unit Task Force Polis DiRaja Malaysia, antaranya ASP Razlan dan Inspektor Farah diberi tugas untuk menumpaskan sindiket pengedaran dadah dan penyeludupan senjata api antarabangsa. Razlan masih menunggu kata putus dari Farah atas lamarannya. Hubungan yang dibina semakin erat lalu mereka merancang untuk berkahwin - namun sebuah insiden berlaku sebelum perkahwinan mereka.

programme.title: Iskandar
programme.desc: Karl Iskandar baru sahaja kembali ke tanah air untuk mengambil alih perniagaan ayahnya. Kepulangannya itu telah membongkar satu komplot pembunuhan seorang jutawan yang dirancang oleh Ringgo, seorang ketua gangster di Kuala Lumpur. Namun, di sebalik komplot pembunuhan tersebut Iskandar telah menemui satu kebenaran yang amat menyedihkan.

programme.title: Maria Mariana 2
programme.desc: Maria dikejarkan ke hospital dan menemui cinta bersama doktor yang menyelamatkannya. Kemudiannya, dia ditugaskan untuk membanteras sindiket pengedaran dadah. Hubungan Maria dan Mariana kembali tegang apabila bekas kekasih Mariana muncul kembali. Cara hidup liar Mariana menyebabkan dia diperalatkan dan menimbulkan kekacauan dalam hidup mereka.

programme.title: Sembilu 2
programme.desc: Hubungan Awie dan Wati semakin baik dan mereka merancang untuk mengikat tali pertunangan. Sekali lagi menghadapi kesukaran apabila Ziana muncul untuk memecahbelahkan hubungan mereka berdua demi mendapatkan Awie. Menaruh hati kepada Wati, Syamsul ingin menjadikannya sebagai isteri. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Bayangan Maut
programme.desc: Anggota Unit Task Force Polis DiRaja Malaysia, antaranya ASP Razlan dan Inspektor Farah diberi tugas untuk menumpaskan sindiket pengedaran dadah dan penyeludupan senjata api antarabangsa. Razlan masih menunggu kata putus dari Farah atas lamarannya. Hubungan yang dibina semakin erat lalu mereka merancang untuk berkahwin - namun sebuah insiden berlaku sebelum perkahwinan mereka.

programme.title: Soal Hati
programme.desc: Daniel ialah seorang lelaki yang mempunyai segala-galanya. Dia jatuh cinta pandang pertama dengan Nurul Ain, seorang gadis kampung yang bekerja menjadi jurujual. Daniel berusaha untuk memikat Nurul Ain dengan berpura-pura menjadi seorang lelaki bernama Ahmad. Dalam masa yang sama bapa saudara Nurul Ain yang mempunyai masalah kewangan ingin menjodohkannya dengan seorang duda kaya.

programme.title: Bara
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Puteri Megawati, puteri mahkota negara Inderapuri yang mengalami kecederaan dalam satu kemalangan jalanraya telah diselamatkan oleh Hakimi. Semasa meninggalkan tempat kemalangan itu, Hakimi secara tidak sengaja tercicir sebelah kasut yang dipinjam daripada sahabatnya, Kumin. Oleh kerana berasa terhutang budi kepada penyelamatnya, Puteri Megawati meminta pertolongan seorang wartawan untuk mencari “Mr Cinderella” yang menyelamatkannya dengan ganjaran lumayan.

programme.title: Pemburu Bayang
programme.desc: Zamri merupakan seorang bekas banduan yang ingin memulakan hidup baru bersama keluarganya. Namun, nasib tidak menyebelahinya apabila dia diburu kumpulan yang diketuai Ramon. Adik Zamri, Awie ialah seorang penyanyi kumpulan rock popular yang sedang menjalinkan hubungan cinta bersama Ella, yang juga penyanyi rock. Sesuatu terjadi yang menyebabkan Awie dan Ella putus hubungan. Manakala, Zamri pula diuji dengan pelbagai dugaan apabila isterinya dibunuh dengan kejam.

programme.title: Sembilu
programme.desc: Perjalanan cinta seorang penyanyi rock terkenal dengan kekasihnya yang melalui pelbagai cabaran. Awie dan Wati telah bercinta sejak zaman persekolahan namun ditentang oleh abang Wati, Azman. Muncul pula Ziana, penyanyi baru yang sukakan Awie. Dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja untuk memisahkan Awie dan Wati. Kesilapan Awie telah menyedarkan semula rasa cintanya kepada Wati.

programme.title: Maria Mariana
programme.desc: Dua beradik berbeza perwatakan - Maria, anak kebanggaan keluarga yang cemerlang dalam pelajaran - manakala Mariana, anak yang sering memberontak dan liar. Maria membesar menjadi seorang anggota polis namun Mariana masih sama seperti dahulu. Persengketaan terjadi apabila keduanya menyukai lelaki yang sama. Diculik geng, Maria sanggup menaruhkan nyawa demi menyelamatkan Mariana.

programme.title: Bara
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. programme.title: Nafas Cinta
programme.desc: Amir berkelana ke Pulau Bayu untuk menenangkan fikirannya setelah kontrak muziknya dibatalkan. Di sana Amir terpesona dengan kemerduan suara Suria ketika membaca Al Quran. Setelah itu, hubungan Amir dan Suria menjadi semakin rapat. Suria tinggal bersama neneknya yang menghidap penyakit ketumbuhan. Amir membawa Suria dan neneknya ke bandar untuk mendapatkan rawatan serta ingin mengembangkan bakat Suria untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella 2
programme.desc: Hakimi kini menjadi CEO di syarikat Megapuri Bhd yang dimiliki oleh Puteri Megawati. Oleh sebab tidak dapat membiasakan diri dengan kehidupan barunya, Hakimi bertindak dengan meletakkan jawatan dan perkara ini merisaukan Puteri Megawati. programme.title: Nafas Cinta
programme.desc: Amir berkelana ke Pulau Bayu untuk menenangkan fikirannya setelah kontrak muziknya dibatalkan. Di sana Amir terpesona dengan kemerduan suara Suria ketika membaca Al Quran. Setelah itu, hubungan Amir dan Suria menjadi semakin rapat. Suria tinggal bersama neneknya yang menghidap penyakit ketumbuhan. Amir membawa Suria dan neneknya ke bandar untuk mendapatkan rawatan serta ingin mengembangkan bakat Suria untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi.

programme.title: Maria Mariana 2
programme.desc: Maria dikejarkan ke hospital dan menemui cinta bersama doktor yang menyelamatkannya. Kemudiannya, dia ditugaskan untuk membanteras sindiket pengedaran dadah. Hubungan Maria dan Mariana kembali tegang apabila bekas kekasih Mariana muncul kembali. Cara hidup liar Mariana menyebabkan dia diperalatkan dan menimbulkan kekacauan dalam hidup mereka.

programme.title: Bayangan Maut
programme.desc: Anggota Unit Task Force Polis DiRaja Malaysia, antaranya ASP Razlan dan Inspektor Farah diberi tugas untuk menumpaskan sindiket pengedaran dadah dan penyeludupan senjata api antarabangsa. Razlan masih menunggu kata putus dari Farah atas lamarannya. Hubungan yang dibina semakin erat lalu mereka merancang untuk berkahwin - namun sebuah insiden berlaku sebelum perkahwinan mereka.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella 2
programme.desc: Hakimi kini menjadi CEO di syarikat Megapuri Bhd yang dimiliki oleh Puteri Megawati. Oleh sebab tidak dapat membiasakan diri dengan kehidupan barunya, Hakimi bertindak dengan meletakkan jawatan dan perkara ini merisaukan Puteri Megawati. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang wanita bernama Anisah jatuh hati kepada Hakimi. Dia menawarkan pekerjaan kepada Hakimi di syarikatnya dan pelbagai konflik berlaku di antara Hakimi, Puteri Megawati dan Anisah.

programme.title: Masuk Jawi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang 3 orang budak lelaki bernama Tat,Syamin Dan Erry Yang Sudah beberapa Kali terlepas Dari berkhatan.dan Kali ini,mereka disunat oleh Tok mudim.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: seorang lelaki yang ditugaskan untuk menentang penjenayah yang bermaharajalela dan bertindak zalim terhadap penduduk kampung . Pengembaraan tersebut dilalui dengan pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja terpaksa berhadapan dengan penjenayah malah pemimpin yang menyalahgunakan kuasa dalam menjalankan tugas yang diamanahkan

programme.title: Permintaan Terakhir Abah
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Abah yang ingin meyatukan anak-anaknya yang semakin jauh terpisah kerana perbezaan pendapat. Abah tekad membetulkan keadaan dengan permintaan pelik.

programme.title: 2022 Tsunami
programme.desc: Pada tahun 2022, Perdana Menteri Tribhop dan Dr. Siam menubuhkan pusat amaran bencana negara untuk mengelakkan bencana tsunami yang lain. Tetapi usaha mereka terbukti sia-sia apabila tragedi melanda lagi.

programme.desc: Mengisahkan Adib seorang anak yatim piatu, diambil oleh sebuah keluarga dan dijadikan anak angkat. Adib merasakan dia telah mengkhianati ibunya sehingga menyebabkan dia lari balik ke rumah ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar
programme.desc: Seorang gangster veteran, Dollah yang selalu bermimpi menjadi pelakon mendapat peluang seumur hidup apabila pelakon popular memintanya untuk menjadi mentornya untuk filem aksi. Seorang samseng di lokasi penggambaran, Dollah pasti menimbulkan pelbagai kekacauan.

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Wanda seorang gadis kampung yang datang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja di sebuah Café milik makciknya, telah bertemu dengan seorang jejaka yang gila dengan masakan Kari dan Wanda seorang yang hanya pandai memasak Tom Yam yang akhirnya menjadi satu cinta. Pelbagai dugaan dan telatah mereka berdua yang ditempuh semasa mengenali antara satu sama lain.

programme.desc: seorang gadis jatuh hati kepada seorang pemuda tampan yang merupakan ketua pegawai eksekutif di syarikat miliknya . programme.title: Cendera Kasih
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditinggalkan isterinya akibat perbuatan ibunya sendiri berjumpa semula dengan isterinya apabila ditugaskan menguruskan projek di kedah . Lelaki yang masih sayangkan isteri dan anaknya itu merayu supaya isterinya pulang ke pangkuannya

programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mak Yah terkenal dengan sikap yang suka memaki hamun dan bercakap kasar. Tahun ini merupakan tahun pertama bagi Mak Yah untuk menyambut Hari Raya seorang diri. Orang kampung sedih melihat Mak Yah kerana dia masih lagi belum boleh menerima hakikat kerana semua ini berlaku di atas sikapnya yang sering memarahi anak menantunya sehingga mereka sekeluarga nekad keluar dari rumah dan terlibat dengan kemalangan yang meragut nyawa mereka semua.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Syif Malam Raya
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang empat rakan yang mengalami kejadian aneh ketika mereka dalam perjalanan pulang ke kampung pada malam raya. Zaid dan Hisyam menumpangkan Mera serta Yoh dalam perjalanan menghantar mayat ke Ipoh.

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . programme.title: Wajik Lebaran dan Tangisan Ibu
programme.desc: Profesion Puan Farida ialah penjual kuih tradisional. Dia tinggal bersama anak sulungnya, Bahar, yang merupakan seorang mekanik. Bahar memerlukan wang untuk rawatan perubatan ibunya kerana dia sakit kepala. Bagaimanapun, Bahar telah dipecat oleh bosnya, Encik Nasron. Oleh kerana Bahar tidak mampu membayar rawatan perubatan, dia membawa ibunya pulang. Malangnya, rumah mereka dirampas.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep93
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep19
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep17
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep46
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep94

programme.title: Mudik Lebaran Terakhir Untuk Ibu
programme.desc: Siti bersusah payah mencari wang untuk keluarganya. Malangnya, bosnya tidak membenarkan Siti berkomunikasi dengan keluarganya, dan dia terpaksa menghilangkan diri tanpa berkata apa-apa. Pada suatu hari, Siti dibebaskan oleh bosnya dan dia pulang untuk melawat ibu dan adiknya. Bagaimanapun, dia mendapati kedua-duanya sudah tidak hidup lagi.

programme.title: Feng Shui
programme.desc: Amid the time of Korean War, a young boy's vow to take care of his family marked the beginning of a lifelong promise spanning 60 years.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: My Wife Is A Gangster 3
programme.desc: The daughter of a Hong Kong triad boss is accused of killing the leader of their rivals. She goes into hiding in Korea and meets Ki-chul and his crew, who are assigned to protect her.

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman who gets tired of her difficult life in the city returns to her rural hometown. There, she meets her childhood friends and heals her emotional wounds.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Homme Fatale
programme.desc: A lovely young man becomes the first male gisaeng in Joseon to help his mother’s failing business. Until one day, a flower-like woman walks into his life and changes everything…

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Miss Baek
programme.desc: A woman finds it difficult to shake off her ex-convict label, until she meets a girl whom she is determined to save.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Three Sisters
programme.desc: Three sisters reunited for their father's birthday, yet the strange action of their brother reveals their dark past.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover they’ve switched bodies.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Two Faces Of My Girlfriend
programme.desc: An awkward, almost 30-year-old man meets a sweet, innocent and bashful girl but he soon discovers a completely different side to her!

programme.title: Christmas In August
programme.desc: A young man who owns a photo studio suffers from a fatal disease. He meets a policewoman and falls in love with her. What will be the fate of this love - will it be a tragic ending?

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officer’s soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: Oh! My Ghost
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: The Battle: Roar To Victory
programme.desc: In 1920, a fierce battle takes place between the Korean independence militias and imperialist Japanese forces in Manchuria, China.

programme.title: An Old Lady
programme.desc: A 69-year-old woman was raped by a 29-year-old male nurse. Taking the courage to report to the police, people questioned the credibility of her claim. Could she protects her dignity?

programme.title: Confession Of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book "I am the Murderer", claiming responsibility for the crimes.

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer in her 40s suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: A Company Man
programme.desc: When a skilled contract killer decides to resign in search of a different lifestyle, he becomes his company's target.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Love Actually Season 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Continuing the pattern of last season, a group of young men and women over the age of 30 are invited to live in an apartment for one month. programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 2 Ep2
programme.desc: A blind date program hosted by Meng Fei. Participants will join a blind date with their parents, to explore the topics of love and marriage. The difference of value of marriage between two generations will be shown.

programme.title: The Lucky 2% Ep3
programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.title: Sisters’ Treats Ep11
programme.desc: Ada Choi, Athena Chu, Monica Chan, and Catherine Hung, who are being friends for 30 years, work as partners to operate a restaurant together. With a young actor to be the manager in the restaurant, some activities with special features and gimmicks will be held to attract the young generations to visit and “check in”.

programme.title: The Shape Of Culture Season 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The cultural show invited Shan Jixiang, Yun Zhou, Yan Xiao, Niu Junfeng as "youth troupe" to present new wonders, new landmarks, new sights and the diversity of world heritages and civilization from multiple perspectives and to undercover the story of the World Heritage sites behind.

programme.desc: Continuing the pattern of last season, a group of young men and women over the age of 30 are invited to live in an apartment for one month. programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: The Talent Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The first Gen Z competition reality show - 12 teenagers were selected to join the "Tsing Pek Summer Camp" and test their problem-solving skills. Xie Nan, Jiang Changjian, and Wei Kunlin (Dr. Wei) were formed as a guardian group, together with Ding Ruoxu, Leo Li, Jay Song, etc. who jointly escort the players on the "Ling-guang Island Tour".

programme.title: Strawberryman Ep5
programme.desc: Breaking the traditional mode of music variety show, around 24 groups of rock bands, folk bands, hip-hop, electronic and other styles of musicians are invited to perform in an outdoor concert and become a member of Strawberryman. The guests include Jam Hsiao, GAI, and Zhang Ya Dong.

programme.title: The Talent Ep7
programme.desc: The program setting is based on eight concepts while the teenagers would have to use creative thinking to stimulate their imagination and use paper and pen, as well as programming, to solve different problems. Finally, the one who can fulfill all of the concepts would be picked. The guests include Ma Qing Yun, Annie Yi, and Sunnee.

programme.title: Slam Dunk Teenager Season 2 Ep5
programme.desc: A reality show combined with AI image Captain.S virtual scene presentation to achieve a more diversified screen content. Gathered young athletes with basketball elites from 30 cities, the event is divided into three stages: city audition, star training camp and the ultimate battle, creating more innovative ways to play.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10331034
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45934594
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1803
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3586
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3586

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45944595
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10351036
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2022
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep390
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2024
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) (Repeat) Ep11
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents’ money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a “Mr McDreamy Training Academy” using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into “Mr McDreamies” with hilarious results.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: A young policeman goes undercover to try and capture a criminal group specializing in mobile fraud who has swindled hundreds of millions of yuan from business tycoons and ordinary people.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but a series of inexplicable events lead her to believe that she not only gets the gift of eyesight. She comes to understand whenever she looks into a mirror she sees another woman instead of herself. Mun recalls things changed since the cornea was replaced, and hopes to uncover the truth?

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to “supervise” their sons and nephews to make it happen…

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him…

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fung’s life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named “Shadow Whip”, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to “Shadow Whip”?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three men who are close as brothers is put through the ultimate test when one of them gives in to corruption and pursues his love for his friend's wife.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chu’s family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Santhanam, Shritha Sivadas, Rajendran, T.M. Karthik Srinivasan, Kavitha Ranjini

programme.desc: Sebbe is fifteen. He never planned to build a bomb but now, he has one in his hands. Growing up poor and with a single mother, life had always been difficult. The junkyard soon became his place of refuge where he could detach himself from the world.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy they’re babysitting and he disappears – never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: Deadly Dormitory
programme.desc: When a University student refuses to sleep with her professor in exchange for good grades, she’s in danger of being killed to keep her quiet, and her mother must drop everything to save her.

programme.title: Fatal Crossing
programme.desc: High flying tech entrepreneur Carson wakes up in a bloody car with no memory of what happened the night before. His world in chaos, things only get worse when he falls for June, who believes Carson killed her boyfriend.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Once-incarcerated Marcus Cowans is trying to turn over a new leaf with the support of his loving family. Upon discovering that one of his brothers may have been involved in a horrific crime, Marcus grapples with the limits of brotherhood and loyalty.

programme.title: Category 5
programme.desc: A series of disastrous geological coincidences occur creating a perfect storm scenario and forming the largest hurricane in human history.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: A group of medical students are about to die . . . and live to tell about it.

programme.title: Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: A Dark Truth
programme.desc: An ex-CIA op-turned-political talk show host is hired by a corporate whistleblower to expose her company’s cover-up of a massacre in a South American village.

programme.title: Sliver
programme.desc: A literary agent's life seems to take a turn for the better when she moves into a new apartment and develops a romance but as the history of the building and its occupants unfolds, she is plunged into a terrifying nightmare of high-tech voyeurism and murder.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.

programme.title: Global Effect
programme.desc: A soldier (Daniel Bernhardt) leads a band of mercenaries to rescue a scientist (Mädchen Amick) and prevent a terrorist (Joel West) from unleashing a devastating virus.

programme.desc: In this first episode, Samira journeys to places rarely seen by western audiences to reveal how the Persian Empire was born, the mysterious writing of its early people and how Iran's powerful kings built a vast empire that became the envy of the ancient world.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into food factories. Today we see the production of hot sauce, lemon Italian ice and packed peanuts.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep22
programme.desc: A look at the production of food in the our food factories. This episode looks at the factories producing mustard, wafer biscuits, teriyaki sauce and coconut macaroons.

programme.title: Animal Einsteins (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Masterminds - Using innovative techniques, Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brainpower.

programme.desc: Snared - Lessons are learned and personal battles are fought by Alaskans enduring winter's descent. Chip and Agnes hailstone dig their boat out of the ice and Ricko Dewilde takes his two daughters on a hunt.

programme.desc: Zambezi - Follow the journey of the mighty Zambezi - Africa's wildest river. It floods across endless plains, fuelling the migration of 30,000 wildebeest, turning villages into islands accessible only by boat.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Since 1939, more than eight billion Shreddies have been made; watch how it's done. See how a batch of Black Forest cakes take 12,000 cherries to make, and how tzatziki is made by the tanker full.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: Watch how lasagne is assembled by both man and machine, and see how one batch of brownies makes 6,500 treats. And you can find out about the secret spice blend for maple caramelized onions.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Hide and Seek follows tigers, harpy eagles, chimpanzees, army ants and other predators as they rise to the challenge of hunting within the forest - a dense, confusing, three-dimensional world.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: At the Gateway to India on Mumbai harbour, Joanna faces the beautiful stone archway through which she left India in 1947. She also explores India's caste system; an illegal classification that segregates people into social groups from birth.

programme.title: Robson and Jim's Icelandic Fly Fishing Adventure (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Time is running out for actors Robson Green and Jim Murray as their time in Iceland is coming to a close.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Since 1939, more than eight billion Shreddies have been made; watch how it's done. See how a batch of Black Forest cakes take 12,000 cherries to make, and how tzatziki is made by the tanker full.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: Watch how lasagne is assembled by both man and machine, and see how one batch of brownies makes 6,500 treats. And you can find out about the secret spice blend for maple caramelized onions.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Hide and Seek follows tigers, harpy eagles, chimpanzees, army ants and other predators as they rise to the challenge of hunting within the forest - a dense, confusing, three-dimensional world.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: At the Gateway to India on Mumbai harbour, Joanna faces the beautiful stone archway through which she left India in 1947. She also explores India's caste system; an illegal classification that segregates people into social groups from birth.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: See the secrets of the ice cream served like a cake, or the production of tangy tartar sauce, and a machine called the "encruster" that makes a single batch of 2,700 bite-size cake pops.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: A look at ready-to-blend fruit smoothies, and turning raw organic cocoa beans into chocolate bars. Plus the production of delicious paneer, and the story behind wasabi.

programme.title: Equator From The Air (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: South East Asia - In South East Asia, booming economies are taking a toll on the natural world. Gordon discovers how eyes in the sky are helping protect endangered orangutans, elephants and people.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Yorkshire - In Yorkshire, Kate heads to the fishing village of Staithes which was once home to one of Yorkshire's largest fishing fleets, and the explorer Captain Cook.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: Thailand - Robson visits the freshwater lakes around Bangkok to track down some of the world's largest freshwater fish - Mekong Giant Catfish and Arapaima.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep2
programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Esti’s leg infection puts the brakes on this young duiker’s release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep5
programme.desc: A Pangolin's Plight - Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocodile Capers - Strap in for Dr. Amanda’s risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who’s headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble - Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they’re foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Lost Boy - Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Here Comes the Rain - Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Realm of the Spectacled Bear - Get to know South America’s only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Crocodiles - Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; they’re among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now they’re protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia's Longest Day - See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A New Zealand Christmas - See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Lost Boy - Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Weatherproof - Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Agile - Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Dune Kingdoms - Just off the east coast of South Africa, lie two different worlds. One is a stage for the bold and the beautiful. While in the other, ambush and camouflage reign. Both are home to a vast array of life, from ancient residents to ocean wanderers. These are the Dune Kingdoms of Aliwal and Sodwana.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Flying Fox - Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet – the bat – and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Koala Called Cavendish - Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky and Stinky - Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina’s fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic’s toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who’s quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Weatherproof - Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.
